body_text: This sort method won't work. Immutable's .sort() method (and JS's as well), want a comparator that returns 0, 1, or -1.
body: This sort method won't work. Immutable's `.sort()` method (and JS's as well), want a comparator that returns `0`, `1`, or `-1`.
body_html: This sort method won't work. Immutable's .sort() method (and JS's as well), want a comparator that returns 0, 1, or -1.
